library(tidyverse)

## Wide to long
```{r}
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
pulse_data
```

```{r}
pulse_tidy_data = 
  pivot_longer(
    pulse_data, 
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit", 
    values_to = "bdi")
pulse_tidy_data
```
